rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Everyone, thank you for
your help in Acedia.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Thanks to you, I have been
able to carry out my
official duties as usual.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Please take care of Special
Inquisitor Meleph and Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I too believe that the hope of Alst lies
with the Heaven's Holy Grail, her Driver,
and where their journey takes them.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0005
rows.name:
You need not worry about
anything here. Sister, please
continue your journey.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0006
rows.name:
I can see it clearly; your
face is more vibrant now
than I have ever seen it.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0007
rows.name:
I find myself almost
jealous of Rex-san.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Hehehe... I wish you good
fortune in battle...
